dataset_information.formal_name: Survey of Health, Ageing, and Retirement in Europe (SHARE)
dataset_information.missing_data: Missing values supplemented with information from earlier waves (2004-2015) and multiply imputed variables provided by the SHARE team.

usage_in_paper.specifics: Used to explore the effects of socioeconomic position, the experience of a period of hunger, the dispossession of assets, and discrimination suffered by parents in respondents' life courses on later life health inequalities in Europe.

study_context.study_title: Life-Course Factors and Later Life Health in Eastern and Western Europe

authors.name: Luule Sakkeus
affiliations: School of Governance, Law and Society

authors.name: Liili Abuladze
affiliations: School of Governance, Law and Society

authors.name: Uku Rudissaar
affiliations: School of Governance, Law and Society

dependent_variables.name: Poor self-rated health
dependent_variables.measurement: Self-reported health rating (1 = excellent to 5 = poor), recoded as 0 for 'very good' and 1 for 'good', 'fair', and 'poor'

dependent_variables.name: Limited in everyday activities
dependent_variables.measurement: Global Activity Limitations Index (GALI), recoded as 0 for 'no limitations' and 1 for 'moderately limited' and 'severely limited'

dependent_variables.name: Poor immediate word recall
dependent_variables.measurement: Number of words recalled from a ten-word list after a 1-minute interval, recoded as 0 for 5-10 words and 1 for 0-4 words

dependent_variables.name: Poor delayed word recall
dependent_variables.measurement: Number of words recalled from a ten-word list after completing other SHARE questions, recoded as 0 for 5-10 words and 1 for 0-4 words

independent_variables.name: Disadvantaged SEP in childhood or adulthood
categories: Not in childhood and not in adulthood (0)

independent_variables.name: Experienced hunger period in childhood or adulthood
categories: Not in childhood and not in adulthood (0)

independent_variables.name: Experienced dispossession in childhood or adulthood
categories: Not in childhood and not in adulthood (0)

independent_variables.name: Parents experienced at least 1 act of discrimination
categories: Not the mother and not the father (0)
